tool.name: Copernicus CMEMS Downloader for AquaINFRA marine model
tool.description: Download data from the Copernicus Marine Service to provide as input to the AquaINFRA marine model. Products: Mediterranean Sea Physics Analysis and Forecast or Mediterranean Sea Physics Reanalysis, depending on the selected temporal period.

param.name: min_lat
param.label: Min latitude (ºN)
param.help: Minimum latitude value for the data subset (southern boundary latitude).

param.name: max_lat
param.label: Max latitude (ºN)
param.help: Maximum latitude value for the data subset (northern boundary latitude).

param.name: min_lon
param.label: Min longitude (ºE)
param.help: Minimum longitude value for the data subset (western boundary longitude).

param.name: max_lon
param.label: Max longitude (ºE)
param.help: Maximum longitude value for the data subset (eastern boundary longitude).

param.name: min_depth
param.label: Min depth (m)
param.help: Minimum depth value for the data subset (requires a positive float or 0).

param.name: max_depth
param.label: Max depth (m)
param.help: Maximum depth value for the data subset (requires a positive float or 0).

param.name: start_date
param.label: Start date (YYYY-MM-DD)
param.help: The start datetime of the temporal data subset.

validator.message: Date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format

param.name: end_date
param.label: End date (YYYY-MM-DD)
param.help: The end datetime of the temporal data subset.

validator.message: Date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format

param.name: bc_south
param.label: OBC South
param.help: Open Boundary Conditions (OBCs) in the southern boundary.

param.name: bc_north
param.label: OBC North
param.help: Open Boundary Conditions (OBCs) in the northern boundary.

param.name: bc_west
param.label: OBC West
param.help: Open Boundary Conditions (OBCs) in the western boundary.

param.name: bc_east
param.label: OBC East
param.help: Open Boundary Conditions (OBCs) in the eastern boundary.

tool.help:
This tool downloads data subsets from the **Copernicus Marine Service (CMEMS)** using the **Copernicus Marine Toolbox** v2.0, to give later as input to the AquaINFRA marine model.
### Requirements
To use this tool, users must:
- Have a valid account on the Copernicus Marine Service: https://marine.copernicus.eu
### Outputs
Outputs are a zip file containing different NetCDF (.nc) files: IC_cm_t.nc, IC_cm_sal.nc, IC_cm_cur.nc, OB{S/N/W/E}_cm_t.nc, OB{S/N/W/E}_cm_sal.nc, OB{S/N/W/E}_cm_cur.nc
